snippet: In a memo sent late Friday afternoon, Dewey & LeBoeuf management acknowledged for the first time that the firm could shut down.
abstract: In a memo sent late Friday afternoon, Dewey & LeBoeuf management acknowledged for the first time that the firm could shut down.

headline.main: Dewey Leadership Acknowledges the Firm Could Close
headline.print_headline: Dewey & LeBoeuf’s Leadership Acknowledges That the Firm Could Close
